name: deimosrising
text: Audio nudity? Ray has class.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Also Interracial. Ray doesn't discriminate.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Doesn't he? It is separated from the other nudities.

name: thatskotkid
text: You know what they say about guys with mp3s of their butts on the Internet...

name: wittyname
text: No, I don't!

name: professoryes
text: Well, uh, just do it, okay? I can't tell you what'll happen, but it'll be AMAZING.

name: belgand
text: Frank Zappa was once arrested for producing audio nudity early in his career. Even though it was actually just simulated audio nudity. Fight for your right to be audibly naked!

name: ssddr
text: I think the "Full-Fledged Male" suscription is ray's way of coping with being neutered.

name: semiquaver
text: Hells yes he can still sport wood!

name: lawbot
text: Good avatar/comment synergy.

name: i_love_kate
text: I'm guessing he didn't have a cow being ground into paste for his avatar when you said that?

name: ted0phile
text: Because the implications otherwise would be horrifying.

name: semiquaver
text:
Guys, guys. Do I need to change back into Stephen Colbert? Because I could split this both ways and make it Barack Obama being made into a burger. And then unmade. If that would make you happy. You know, if.

*sighs* I need a project, is what I'm saying here.

name: gouldgonewild
text: Interracial Nudity?

name: semiquaver
text: As much as I like you comment, I feel compelled to point out that however titillating he may be, one man's nudity alone cannot really be interracial.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Ebony and ivory!
Fused together through
surrrrgerrrrrryyyyyyy!

name: semiquaver
text: These are frightening new developments which I simply cannot encourage.

name: greenkoolayd
text: unless that man is multi-racial...

name: heatbag
text:
Ray is such a big fan of the interracial it gets its own budget item.
I am the same way.

name: greymantledwolf
text: i like this comment system, everything i was going to say has already been said, except this acknowledgment of everything having already been said.

name: catgrl131
text: Wellp, everything I wanted to say has been- OH CRAP.

name: rotating-dog
text: Ray looks so pissed in panel 5. He always knew his expense account would never fly with HR.

name: ashoykh
text: I like that 'interracial' is a new media type.

text: How do you get interracial nudity?

text:
Ebony and ivory
Nude together in perfect harmony
Side by side on my piano keyboard
Oh lord why don't we?

name: d-pad
text: I just love how organized he is with his nudity. Shows some serious class.

name: spiderbaby
text: Could I get a weekly colour strip without no joke?

name: snowman
text: best first panel ever

name: wilbur
text: Yeah, I like to think that this actually takes place about eight minutes after Ray first told Teodor that they lost the job.

name: biznart
text: Ray didn't strike me as the type that would be into aural sex.  You think you know a guy...

name: mikeronomicon
text: Nudity on the company budget warrants a five for this strip.

name: hamscout
text:
I recently renewed my subscription to "The Half-Assed Male".
One more year of 182.5 issues, and the bonus gift is the upgrade to "The Full-Fledged Male"...

Football phone, my ass!!

text: I'm usually rockin only fully nude audio!

name: sje46
text:
Shut up loser.

I say this because you are a loser.
